requirement_title: Automated Code Review & Quality Gates Integration

implementation_summary.description: Successfully implemented comprehensive frontend components for automated code review and quality gates system. Enhanced existing CodeQualityDashboard with validation history tab and created detailed validation result page with drill-down capabilities. Added full i18n support for all code quality features.
implementation_summary.approach: Built upon existing backend GraphQL schema and resolvers (already completed by Roy). Leveraged existing comprehensive GraphQL queries in codeQuality.ts. Enhanced dashboard with new validation history tab showing clickable validation results. Created detailed validation page with accordion-based error display, status badges, and comprehensive metrics visualization.
key_features: Validation History tab in Code Quality Dashboard with real-time polling (60s intervals)
Clickable table rows navigating to detailed validation results
Quality Gate Validation Detail Page with comprehensive metrics
Status badge visualization (passed/failed/skipped) with color coding
Expandable error details using MUI Accordion components
Validation checks grid showing results for linting, type checking, tests, complexity, coverage, and security
Full i18n support with 60+ translation keys
Error handling with loading states and error messages

files_modified.description: Added Validation History tab with validation results table. Imported useNavigate, GET_QUALITY_GATE_VALIDATIONS query, and Button component. Updated tab indices from 4 to 5 tabs. Added clickable table rows navigating to validation detail page.
key_changes: Added useNavigate hook for programmatic navigation
Added GET_QUALITY_GATE_VALIDATIONS GraphQL query with 60s polling
Added new tab at index 1 for 'Validation History'
Shifted existing tabs (Agent Scores, Bypasses, Pipeline) from indices 1,2,3 to 2,3,4
Created validation results table with columns: Req Number, Agent, Status, Linting, Type Check, Tests, Coverage, Security, Duration, Created, Actions
Implemented status badge icons (CheckCircle, XCircle, AlertTriangle) with color coding
Added onClick navigation to detail page (/quality/code-quality/validations/:id)
Added 'View Details' button for each validation row

files_modified.description: New comprehensive detail page for individual quality gate validation results. Displays validation status, checks breakdown, error details, recommendations, and file changes.
key_changes: Created full detail page component with TypeScript interfaces
Implemented GET_QUALITY_GATE_VALIDATION GraphQL query
Back navigation button to dashboard
Overall status Alert component (success/error based on validation result)
Summary cards grid showing: Req Number, Agent, Duration, Overall Status
Validation Checks grid with 6 check types (linting, type check, tests, complexity, coverage, security)
Status icons and color coding for each check (passed/failed/skipped)
Expandable Accordion sections for error details with error/warning counts
Recommendations list with Chip components
File changes breakdown showing created/modified/deleted file counts
Helper functions: getStatusIcon(), getStatusColor(), formatDuration()
Loading and error states with appropriate UI feedback
Full i18n integration with translation keys
files_modified.complexity: High - New comprehensive detail page with complex data visualization

files_modified.description: Added import and route for QualityGateValidationDetailPage.
key_changes: Added import: import { QualityGateValidationDetailPage } from './pages/QualityGateValidationDetailPage';
Added route: <Route path="/quality/code-quality/validations/:id" element={<QualityGateValidationDetailPage />} />
Route placed within ProtectedRoute wrapper requiring authentication
Route uses :id parameter for validation ID

files_modified.description: Added comprehensive i18n translations for code quality features including dashboard labels, validation detail page content, and status messages.
key_changes: Added 'codeQuality' translation namespace with 60+ keys
Dashboard translations: title, subtitle, tab labels, metrics labels
Validation history table column headers: reqNumber, agent, status, linting, typeCheck, tests, coverage, security, duration, created, actions
Validation detail page translations: title, backToDashboard, overallStatus, summary sections
Validation checks labels: lintingCheck, typeCheckCheck, unitTestsCheck, complexityCheck, coverageCheck, securityCheck
Status labels: passed, failed, warning, skipped, pending
Error detail translations: errorDetails, errors, warnings, noErrors
File changes labels: filesCreated, filesModified, filesDeleted
Loading and error states: loading, notFound, error messages

User clicks on a validation row or 'View Details' button
User clicks 'Back to Code Quality Dashboard' to return
